_header: Saint Matthew the evangelist / Says that Saint John the Baptist
_description: Gospel for the Third Sunday in Advent in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte mathewe þe ewangelisteSaise þat saint Iohan
                    þe baptiste…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…In stede of tale i will ȝow tellHow it of his slaghtir
                    fell

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Matheu þe EwangelistSeiþ þat seint Ion þe
                    Baptist…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…In stude of tale I wol ow telleHou hit of his slauhtur
                    felle
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Cum audisset Iohannes inuinculis opera cristi (f.
                    168rb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Seynt Matheu þe euangelistSais þat Seynt Iohne
                    baptist…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…To blisse þat may haue none endyngeOure lorde ihesu
                    þedire vs bryng

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Mathew þe euangelistseyth þat seynt iohn
                    baptist…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…In stede of a tale I wile ȝow tellehou it of his sleing
                    befelle
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Cum Audisset iohannes in vinculis opera cristi (f.
                    45v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Sante mathew þe wangelysteSays þat sant iohn þe
                    baptyste…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…In stede of tale I wyll ȝou tellHow yt of hys schandyre
                    fell

BLAdd30358.First Lines:
Saynt mathew þe euangylistSayse þat saynt Ion þe
                    Baptist…
BLAdd30358.Last Lines:
…I send he sayd my mesangerBe for my face my word to
                    ber

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Sant mathow þis euagoliste Sais þat saint Iohn þe
                    baptiste…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Vnto þat blise þat has na endyngeOure ihesus
                    þithir vs brynge Amen

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Mathi telles til vs ilkaneHow iohn þe baptist here was tane…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Al þat his worthi childer wareLed þaire liues efter his lare
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “CUm audisset Iohannes in uinculis”; missing lines in middle due to loss of folio between 5 and 6.
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica iii aduentus secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 5va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.169-171, 177-178.

EDCPCM.First Lines:
sAyn mathew þe wangelisteSais þat sain Ion þe
                    baptiste…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…In sted of tal I wille you telleHou it of his slahter
                    felle
EDCPCM.Attributed Title:
Dominica iiia aduentus domini secundum matheum (f.
                        20va)

Lam260.First Lines:
SAynt mathew þe wangelystSayd þat þe sayng Iohn
                    baptist…
Lam260.Last Lines:
…In sted of a tale I wyll ȝow telleHow it of hys
                    slaghtyre fell

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seynt mathu þe wangelystSeyt þat seynt Ion þe
                    baptyst…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…He helyd noght bot styth he stodeAnd for soth saw schad hys
                    blodeIn styd of tayl I wol ȝow tellHow hyt of hys slaghtyr
                    fellSais þat saint Iohn þe baptiste
HunHM129.Note:
Ends two lines earlier than usual, with last two lines above treated as
                    first two of 5353.
